mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_ID, TITLE, NICKNAME FROM ( SELECT B.BOARD_ID, B.TITLE, M.NICKNAME, COUNT(L.BOARD_ID) AS LIKE_COUNT FROM TB_BOARD B JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON B.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID LEFT JOIN TB_BOARD_LIKE L ON B.BOARD_ID = L.BOARD_ID GROUP BY B.BOARD_ID, B.TITLE, M.NICKNAME ORDER BY LIKE_COUNT DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 3
